title: She Wolves
description: It has been said that your twenties are the best years of your life, but in some cases, they may be the worst. How far is too far when you're young at heart?Carmen and her two best friends are playing a game of “survival of the fittest” in party girl world. Embracing the chaos of youth, they are met with the challenges of growing up, finding a purpose and accepting the fate of life’s unknown. Get lost in the throes of young survival where relationships are tested, futures are uncertain and the parties are to die for.
author: Carmen  Chapman
